ISSUE.TITLE: Add North Korea and South Korea as alternate spellings of the DPRK and ROK.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Most all data sources refer to these two countries by their geographic names. In order to connect this data to other sources, a way to refer to these two countries as North Korea and South Korea would be required.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Update capitals of Burundi, Eswatini and Sri Lanka Fixes #133

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Adding North and South Korea as alternate spellings Fixes #119
